axis 6: 20 # APPLIED_TUNING_TORQUE_PERCENT - (maximum) generated torque while finding offset value as a percentage of rated torque
500 # PULL_BRAKE_TIME - time period when the controller tries to release (pull) the brake [milli seconds]
0 # BRAKE_RELEASE_DELAY -  delay in [milli seconds] between the brake blocking and the stop of the control
24 # DC_BUS_VOLTAGE - this parameter is a basis for brake voltage calculation
10 # PROTECTION_MINIMUM_VOLTAGE - minimum tolerable value of dc-bus voltage in [V] (under abnormal conditions)
60 # PROTECTION_MAXIMUM_VOLTAGE - maximum tolerable value of dc-bus voltage in [V] (under abnormal conditions)
40000 # PROTECTION_MAXIMUM_CURRENT - maximum tolerable value of phase current in [mA] (under abnormal conditions)
0x00 # POLARITY - (bit 0x80 invert direction of motion in CSP mode
column9: bit 0x40 invert direction of motion in CSV mode)
2: position PID -> velocity PID -> torque PI
